Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc

Interface Summary
DocSearchEngine An abstract interface representing a search engine used by a DocBackEndLSP to index and access its collection.
 

Class Summary
DocBackEndLSP An abstract BackEndLSP designed to use a search engine to index and access a collection of local, unindexed documents.
DocConfig An object representation of the doc_config.xml descriptor file that a BackEndLSP built on the sdarts.backend.doc package uses to configure itself.
DocConfigBuilder Loads and creates a DocConfig from the doc_config.xml file.
DocConstants A "constants container" for various constants related to text document parsing.
DocContentSummaryBuilder Saves and loads an LSPContentSummary as a flat STARTS XML file.
DocFieldDescriptor A configuration class describing how a field is found in a document.
DocMetaAttributesBuilder Saves and loads an LSPMetaAttributes as a flat STARTS XML file.
